ComicInfo.Title: Part Six: Ruins
ComicInfo.Summary: This is it! The mind blowing, skull melting, extra sized finale to the most epic Living Corpse series yet! The fabric that holds the universe together is collapsing, and only the Living Corpse, Lilith and Doctor Frankenstein stand in the way of the mad Gatekeeper who wants to bring it all down and end reality. It's all out monster action with the fate of reality in the balance and nothing will be the same again! The perfect jumping on point for those who like to skip right to the end!
